name: Archermania
description:
A simple archery game with 32 challenging and unique levels!

Features:

  • Time limit for each level 
  • Wind force to make it more challenging
  • Moving targets
  • Launching targets
  • Different amount of points depending on arrow hit
  • Tutorial level
  • Easy controls & easy to set to set up settings menu

Controls:

  • WASD: to move
  • Spacebar: to jump
  • Left click: to shoot
  • Right click: to cancel arrow shoot
  • X: to clear arrows
  • C: to zoom in to increase aim

Have fun! (if the FPS is too low try changing your resolution!)

Discord: https://discord.gg/xAP9PYK8kE

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/

This is my first big project so I'd appreciate any feedback below.

PS: I recommend you download the app below for higher FPS and graphics, but if you don't want to its also available here:

WEB GL: https://sharemygame.com/@riyadwritescode/archermania
